bibl.title: The Fortunes and Misfortunes of the Gospel of John in Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. Literary Evidence for the Gospel of John in the Early Church in Egypt. - 2. Papyrological Evidence. - 3. Evidence for Doctrinal Trends? - "In summary: We cannot lean on papyrological evidence to bear out the doctrinal orientation of the early Egyptian Church. The argument that the number of early papyri of John supports Bauer's thesis on the gnostic character of earliest Christianity in Egypt seems very frail."
